Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI can be tailored to request specific feedback on work by adjusting questions if feedback doesn't answer the question/requested feedback directly. It's also instant and saves time.
Reaching out to a teach can take time, be difficult to understand and may also be too late (feedback after an assignment is received)

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Being able to adjust questions and get feedback immediately with AI - for example, asking if I'm on the right track with my train of thought for an assignment - makes me feel more encouraged in my ability to complete the task.
As receiving feedback takes time from teachers, this leaves me feeling uncertain until the feedback is received - plus, a lot of the time teachers are unable to be direct in answering whether I'm on the right track. 
Overall, the GenAI makes me feel better

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI does have a risk in giving an incorrect answer - though I believe if used correctly it can be navigated in an appropriate way - there is more trust when speaking to teachers.
